news.title: Crypto's long battle with SEC comes to a close with Ripple victory
news.summary: Ripple said this week that the SEC had officially dropped its four-year-old lawsuit against the company. It was the end of a long battle between the regulator and crypto.

news.title: Trump says 'there'll be flexibility' on reciprocal tariffs
news.summary: President Donald Trump has issued a flurry of tariff announcements since retaking the White House. The announcements have fanning investor uncertainty and fears of a major trade war.

news.title: Heathrow Airport reopens after nearby fire — but travellers told to expect delays
news.summary: British Airways expects 85% of its Saturday Heathrow schedule to run as planned. But the airline warned customers to expect delays at the airport.

news.title: Michigan nuclear plant shows the challenges the U.S. will face in safely restarting old reactors
news.summary: The Palisades nuclear power plant aims to reopen in October, but the steam generators need major repairs. The repairs could delay the schedule.

news.title: Carl Icahn brings two directors to Caesars’ board. What could be next as the activist aims to build value
news.summary: Icahn is bringing two directors to the board and a plan to maximize shareholder value. This isn't Icahn's first foray at Caesars.
